data.eml:eml: Neotype designations and nomenclatural actions for Apionidae described by Johann Ludwig Christian Carl Gravenhorst in 1807 (Coleoptera, Curculionoidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Giusto, Carlo (2015): Neotype designations and nomenclatural actions for Apionidae described by Johann Ludwig Christian Carl Gravenhorst in 1807 (Coleoptera, Curculionoidea). Zootaxa 3986 (5): 597-600, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3986.5.8
